ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: The merchants are many different factions.  There are CoalitionOfTradesFolkI through CoalitionOfTradesFolkIII and many others as well. Astur il Ayan, Cleric of
ygData.messageBody:
The merchants are many different factions. There are CoalitionOfTradesFolkI
through CoalitionOfTradesFolkIII and many others as well.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dizzy J. [mailto:dizzyj@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 11:03 AM
> To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
>
>
> I thought all merchants were beta neutral, meaning they might
> not sell to
> you, but they wont attack (unless you have bad beta neutral
> faction). you
> could always just hit sneak to sell
>
> On Fri, 28 Apr 2000, Jeffrey Sue wrote:
>
> > At 10:11 PM 4/27/00 +0000, you wrote:
> > >The negitive is that they are hated by every other race in
> the world. Try
> > >going to Unrest at 20th or so to collect some of that FS
> or bronze and hoard
> > >it up till you are twice over your weight limit as an
> Iksar, then, try to
> > >find a merchant to sell it too who wont kill you on sight.
> > >
> > >Shelza, Karana
> > >Berfurt, Karana
> > i'm betting you will still be able to sell to the druid at
> the butcherblock druid
> > ring. i thnk that is beta neutral faction. i know for
> sure, my roommate's necro
> > was able to sell there and he was kos just about everywhere else.
> >
